text: My smartwatch screen cracked after a minor bump against a door frame.
I need to change the shipping address for order #8821 immediately.
The noise cancellation on these earbuds creates a weird hissing sound.
How do I download the invoice for my last purchase?
Smart home hub keeps losing connection to the wifi every 2 hours.
The battery on my fitness tracker drains by 50% overnight doing nothing.
Is there a warranty coverage for water damage on the X5 model?
Great job on the new update. Now my watch won't sync at all. Perfect.
The charging case for my earbuds feels loose and doesn't close properly.
Where is the return label? I have been waiting for the email for 2 days.
My robot vacuum just spins in circles and slams into walls.
The touch response on the tablet screen is lagging by a full second.
Love how these 'sweatproof' headphones died after one gym session.
The laptop fan is making a grinding noise like a jet engine taking off.
I cannot log in to my account even after resetting the password twice.
The 5G signal drops constantly even when I am standing next to the tower.
Best customer service ever. Put me on hold for 40 minutes then hung up.
The camera lens on the back of the phone is scratched out of the box.
My smart speaker randomly starts talking in the middle of the night. creepy.
Please cancel my subscription to the cloud storage plan.
